result.markdown: --- title: "Week 6: Exponential smoothing" --- ::: {.cell} ::: ## What you will learn this week * Exponential smoothing methods with trend and seasonality * ETS models * Automatic model selection using the AICc ## Exercises (on your own or in tutorial) Complete Exercises 1-4, 16, 17 from [Section 8.8](https://otexts.com/fpp3/expsmooth-exercises.html). ## Exercise solutions ## Pre-seminar activities Read [Sections 8.4-8.7 of the textbook](https://otexts.com/fpp3/expsmooth.html) and watch all embedded videos. ## Assignments * [IA2](../assignments/A2.qmd) is due on Monday 07 April. * [GA2](../assignments/G2.qmd) is due on Monday 14 April. * [IA3](../assignments/A3.qmd) is due on Monday 28 April.
